resources.string: For those of you who are lazy about typing numbers one by one, you can try using this feature. Just snap a photo in the application or take it from your cellphone gallery, after that you can copy the number or go directly to WhatsApp.

For those of you who are lazy about typing numbers one by one, you can try using this feature. Just snap a photo in the application or take it from your cellphone gallery, after that you can copy the number or go directly to WhatsApp.
